The video clip in question was uploaded: owned broadcasting agency, indicating that it is not recent footage from President Trump's visit to London in June 2019.
The video shows a rally that took place: 2018, which was reported on at the time. This contradicts the claim that the rally happened during Trump's 2019 visit.
The caption accompanying the video false: Trump rally, when in fact it was reported on during the time it occurred.
President Trump himself made false claim: stating that there were only a small number of protesters and thousands of people cheering for him, when in reality there were thousands of anti-Trump protesters in London during his visit.
